entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries at times heavy or rain showers. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Rain showers beginning this evening then changing to flurries at times heavy near midnight and ending before morning. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Local blowing snow overnight. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 6:19 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:19 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 6:19 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
